entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
